
---
title: "Provider"
title_tag: "Resource Provider | Package SignalFx"
meta_desc: "Explore the Provider resource of the SignalFx package, including examples, input properties, output properties, lookup functions, and supporting types. The provider type for the signalfx package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration"
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

The provider type for the signalfx package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.



## Create a Provider Resource {#create}

### Inputs

The Provider resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:

{{% /md %}}</dd>
